VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Path of Heavy Burdens
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Movement speed is decreased by -0.15.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} move sluggishly, weighed down by forgotten knowledge.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Cult of Weakness
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: People are less resilient and their mental break threshold is increased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The inhabitants of {0} are plagued by doubt and uncertainty, their minds fragile.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Breath of Decay
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Toxic resistance is decreased by 0.3.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The lineage of {0} has grown weak, unable to withstand toxic environments.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Forgotten Tradition
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Learning rate of all skills is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every generation in {0} learns more slowly than the last, knowledge slipping away.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Restless Nights
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Rest while sleeping is gained 10% slower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Nighttime in {0} brings only fitful sleep, haunted by what was lost.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Followers of Plague Waters
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Immunity to diseases is gained 10% slower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The once-healing springs of {0} have turned foul, slowing recovery from ailments.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Order of Clumsy Hands
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Injuries are healed 10% slower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0} has forgotten the traditions of skilled healers, slowing the recovery of injuries.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Creed of the Fragile
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Pain threshold, at which colonists go unconscious due to pain, is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Pain overwhelms {0}'s inhabitants, their tolerance weakened by regression.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Way of the Exhausted
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Need to rest depletes 10% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0} wastes energy, leaving them ever tired for the challenges ahead.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Diplomats of Fumbling Tongue
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Colonists are 10% worse at negotiating.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Words fail the people of {0}, making them poor negotiators.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Merchants of Poverty
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Trade prices are worsened by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The marketplace of {0} is known for poor and disadvantageous trade deals.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Guild of Sloth
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Global work speed is decreased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: "Time is wasted," a mantra etched deep within {0}, driving them to work inefficiently.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Wasters of the Vein
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The resource yield of mining jobs is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every strike in {0}'s mines yields less, their extraction techniques forgotten.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Scholars of Regression
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Research speed is decreased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The academic tradition of {0} crumbles, research grinding to a halt.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Neglecters of the Pasture
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The yield of resources obtained from animal handling is decreased by 15%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The bond between {0} and their livestock has weakened, reaping less from their herds.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Harvesters of Blight
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The resource yield of plant jobs is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The once-fertile lands of {0} yield less under the hands of its unskilled cultivators.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Masons of Ruin
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The speed of construction work is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Structures rise slowly in {0}, a testament to the forgotten craftsmanship.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Healers of Slow Hand
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Medical tend speed is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The medical artisans of {0} are known for their slow treatments, prolonging suffering.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Physicians of Imprecision
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Medical tend quality is worsened by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Through years of decline, {0}'s medical practitioners have lost their craft.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Surgeons of Failure
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Medical operation speed is 15% slower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The surgical theatres of {0} are dreaded, with operations dragging on interminably.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Warriors of Imprecision
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chance to hit a melee attack is worsened by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0}'s warriors have lost their prowess, striking wildly in close combat.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Stumblers of the Battlefield
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chance to dodge a melee attack is worsened by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The soldiers of {0} stumble through combat clumsily, taking enemy blows.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Missers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Shooting accuracy is decreased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Drawing from forgotten techniques, {0}'s shooters often miss their mark.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Slowdraw Amateurs
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Aiming a ranged weapon takes 10% more time.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: In the heart of {0}, aiming slowly has become an unfortunate necessity.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Culinary Disasters
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chances of causing food poisoning are increased by 20%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The kitchens of {0} take no care in food preparation, their meals dangerous and unappetizing.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Sloppy Butchers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Yield of resources obtained from butchering creatures is 10% lower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every creature in death is wasted in {0}, much going to rot.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Stinky Streamer
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Social impact of all colonists is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} reek of forgotten knowledge and unwashed regret. Their stench precedes them, making social interactions... difficult.
